text.name: info1
text.text: The NEC PC-8801 was a personal computer, manufactured by Nippon Electric Company and released in 1981, was based on the Zilog Z80 8-bit processor.

text.name: info1
text.text: O NEC PC-8801 foi um computador pessoal, fabricado pela Nippon Electric Company e lançado em 1981, era baseado em no processador 8 bits Zilog Z80.

text.name: info1
text.text: The NEC PC-8801 was a personal computer, manufactured by Nippon Electric Company and released in 1981, was based on the Zilog Z80 8-bit processor.

text.name: info1
text.text: El NEC PC-8801 era una computadora personal, fabricada por Nippon Electric Company y lanzada en 1981, basada en el procesador Zilog Z80 de 8 bits.

text.name: info1
text.text: Le NEC PC-8801 était un ordinateur personnel, fabriqué par Nippon Electric Company et commercialisé en 1981, basé sur le processeur Zilog Z80 à 8 bits.

text.name: info1
text.text: Der NEC PC-8801 war ein Personal Computer, der von der Nippon Electric Company hergestellt und 1981 auf den Markt gebracht wurde und auf dem Zilog Z80 8-Bit-Prozessor basierte.
